info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 8:25PM CDT until July 01 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in east central Illinois... Southeastern Jasper County in southeastern Illinois... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Palestine to Robinson to Willow Hill, moving east-southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hutsonville around 830 PM CDT. Robinson around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Flat Rock, Palestine, Hardinville and New Hebron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
